name: Space Jam 42
description:
Game Concept : there are only limited space in the space for satellites... 

How to play ?   
~~~~~~~~~~~~~  
Launch each satellite in empty blue spots given in the orbit.

Game made in 6 hours for Ludum Dare 42 Game Jame. Will be adding more features in coming week

Tools:  
Programming : Unity, C#  
Audio : LMMS   + sfxr
Art : Blender + Paint.net
